amendment.description: Amendment extends the current authorization of appropriations for the DHS Office of Counternarcotics Enforcement for one year for fiscal year 2006.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 23 printed in part B of House Report 109-84 to extend the current authorization of appropriations for the Office of Counternarcotics Enforcement at DHS to fiscal year 2006.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Souder amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Souder.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Souder amendment (A022) Agreed to by voice vote.
